experience.title: Software Development Engineer
description: Having extensive experience in all aspects of the software development life cycle, I have effectively managed multiple stages such as defining requirements, designing prototypes, implementing  interfaces, conducting thorough testing, and ensuring ongoing maintenance
Involved in designing and implementing Takeoff and Landing(TOLD) software packages for given aircraft such as Gulfstream(G650 and PV10), Embraer(ERJ), and Dassault(DF7x).

experience.title: Software Development Engineer
description: Analyzed clients' requirements to develop products on the T24 core module platform, resulting in the successful implementation of new functionalities
Possesses a strong understanding of payment operations and the requirements from the viewpoint of a customer at a bank.

experience.title: Full Stack Web Developer
description: Worked on 30 - 40 features based on design specifications using React hooks, Context API, Formik, TypeScript, and MongoDB

Ensuring responsive web application development with JavaScript,Node.js, and TypeScript, integrating AWS services for serverless applications, and optimizing MongoDB queries for scalability resulting in 15% improvement in user experience.

experience.title: Full Stack Web Developer (Internship Part-time)
description: Provided support to end-users, assisted in web application development and maintenance, and took 100% ownership of assigned tasks to ensure timely completion and reporting progress.
